english.segment1: I got no time for you now. Making a deal " working the crowd. Got a big chance to better myself. Gotta put you back on the shelf
english.segment2: But yeah, come and see me again some time. Come and see me again some time. When I am better
english.segment3: If you want to live. You gotta live. If you want to live. You cannot live
english.segment4: I've heard I've heard what you say. I know about the claims that you made. Maybe it's true? Where do I start?. I got no time to work this all out
english.segment5: But yeah, come and see me again some time. Come and see me again some time. When I am better
english.segment6: Well if you want to live. You gotta live. So I've been told. But If I want to live. I cannot live?. Don't tell me so
english.segment7: Yeah, come and see me again some time. Come and see me again some time. When I am better
